00014 #ifndef ULIB_TCPSOCKET_H
00015 #define ULIB_TCPSOCKET_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/net/socket.h>
00018 
00019 class U_EXPORT UTCPSocket : public USocket {
00020 public:
00021 
00022         // COSTRUTTORI
00023 
00024         UTCPSocket(bool bSocketIsIPv6 = false) : USocket(bSocketIsIPv6)
00025                 {
00026                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UTCPSocket, "%b", bSocketIsIPv6)
00027                 }
00028 
00029         virtual ~UTCPSocket()
00030                 {
00031                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UTCPSocket)
00032                 }
00033 
00034         // VIRTUAL METHOD
00035 
00041         virtual bool connectServer(const UString& server, int iServPort) { return (USocket::socket(SOCK_STREAM) && USocket::connectServer(server, iServPort)); }
00042 
00047         virtual bool setServer(                                                                   int port, int iBackLog) { return (USocket::socket(SOCK_STREAM) && USocket::setServer(                         port, iBackLog)); }
00048         virtual bool setServer(const UString& cLocalAddr, int port, int iBackLog) { return (USocket::socket(SOCK_STREAM) && USocket::setServer(cLocalAddr, port, iBackLog)); }
00049 
00058         virtual USocket* acceptClient(USocket* pcNewConnection)
00059                 {
00060                 U_TRACE(0, "UTCPSocket::acceptClient(%p)", pcNewConnection)
00061 
00062                 (void) USocket::accept(pcNewConnection);
00063                 
00064                 U_RETURN_POINTER(pcNewConnection,USocket);
00065                 }
00066 
00067         virtual USocket* acceptClient()
00068                 {
00069                 U_TRACE(0, "UTCPSocket::acceptClient()")
00070 
00071                 USocket* pcNewConnection = U_NEW(UTCPSocket(bIPv6Socket));
00072 
00073                 (void) USocket::accept(pcNewConnection);
00074 
00075                 pcNewConnection->bLocalSet     = true;
00076                 pcNewConnection->iLocalPort    = iLocalPort;
00077                 pcNewConnection->cLocalAddress = cLocalAddress;
00078 
00079                 U_RETURN_POINTER(pcNewConnection,USocket);
00080                 }
00081 
00082         // DEBUG
00083 
00084 #ifdef DEBUG
00085         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return USocket::dump(reset); }
00086 #endif
00087 
00088 private:
00089         UTCPSocket(const UTCPSocket&) : USocket(false) {}
00090         UTCPSocket& operator=(const UTCPSocket&)                  { return *this; }
00091 };
